sentences.en: And the Mafia cemented its power by originating the law of silence, the omerta.
sentences.cn: 黑帮采用缄默法, 即所谓守口如瓶的原则,加强了自己的权力.

sentences.en: Even if successful, they are unlikely to eradicate the Mafia.
sentences.cn: 就算成功了, 他们也不大可能根除黑帮.

sentences.en: In the game of Mafia, dead are completely excluded.
sentences.cn: 杀人游戏之中, 死者就彻底退出游戏了.

sentences.en: My friend a latest photo of me. She said it looks like a Mafia.
sentences.cn: 这是朋友为我拍的近照, 她说我看起来象个黑帮.

sentences.en: That the word " Mafia " had originally meant place of refuge.
sentences.cn: 他还摸清了 “ 黑帮”这个词在意大利语里原来的含义是 “ 避难所”.

sentences.en: The deadly Sicilian shotgun was the favorite weapon of the Mafia.
sentences.cn: 这种杀伤力很大的西西里土制滑膛枪,是黑帮喜爱的武器.

sentences.en: The Mafia is by no means ignored by Italian television.
sentences.cn: 黑手党是意大利电视绝不会放过的关注对象。

sentences.en: The person assassinated by the mafia shall turn over his card ( face up ) on the table.
sentences.cn: 被杀的人把他的牌翻过来 ( 面朝上 ) 放在桌上.

sentences.en: The town hall mafia will prevent this plan going through.
sentences.cn: 市政厅的幕后操纵集团将阻挠这一计画.

sentences.en: This wealth of evidence is perilous to the Mafia.
sentences.cn: 证据的之多让黑帮处于危险之中.

trans.tran_en: The Mafia is a criminal organization that makes money illegally, especially by threatening people and dealing in drugs
